page.title: 11NORSK HYDRO AT LEVINGTON
page.content: Norsk Hydro came to Levington in 1982 after Fisons sold the premises. Fisons were a large firm making agricultural and horticultural supplies such as fertilizers.There are five Norsk Hydro bases around Britain and a big base in Oslo.The bases in Britain make about two million pounds a year and the one in Oslo makes three billion pounds a year and employs eighteen thousand people. They sell half a million tons of fertilizer a year. the Levington Research Station is one of Europe's biggest fertilizer research stations and is the head office os Norsk Hydro. They employ three hundred people there.
